script.name: !plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3.menu
script.description: Turret Missile Defense Mk3 - Config and setup
script.sourceplaintext:
*$Debug = [TRUE] * Can view / edit the AI script settings in debug mode.
if $Mode == 'm1' OR $Mode == 'm2' OR $Mode == 'm3' else if $Mode == 'setup' OR $Mode == 'refresh2' else if $Mode == 'refresh' $Race = Argonen else $Mode = 'm1' $Race = Player end $Page = 35
if is datatype[ $Race ] == DATATYPE_SHIP do if $Race -> exists $Race = $Race -> get owner race end skip if is datatype[ $Race ] == DATATYPE_RACE return null
$VarName.Config = 'GZ.MSL.DEF.MK3' + '.AI' do if $Race == Player $VarName.Config = 'GZ.MSL.DEF.MK3' + '.PL' $Config.arr = get global variable: name=$VarName.Config if not is datatype[ $Config.arr ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY gosub Setup end
$Dummy1 = $Config.arr[4] skip if $Dummy1 == 7000 gosub Setup
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Switchboard: if $Mode == 'setup' gosub Setup return $Config.arr else if $Mode == 'refresh' add script global command: script=!plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3.menu, pageid=35, textid=3510, event=[FALSE] gosub Update.Required.Software @ = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.gz.missile.def.mk3.menu : Mode='refresh2' Race or THIS=Player Script=null Turret script array=null return $Config.arr else if $Mode == 'refresh2' gosub Update.Required.Software return $Config.arr end
* Menu loop while not $Mode == 'm1' AND $Menu.Return == -1 if $Mode == 'm1' * Select turret script to edit gosub Menu.Main.Display gosub Menu.Main.Process.Result else if $Mode == 'm2' * Configure this script's priorities gosub Menu.Script.Display gosub Menu.Script.Process.Result else if $Mode == 'm3' * Select level of laser switching gosub Menu.Switch.Display else * Illegal argument return null end end return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Setup: * Player and AI values are kept in completely separate arrays.
$Config.arr = array alloc: size=20 set global variable: name=$VarName.Config value=$Config.arr
* 0-9 are general config values * 1: Max burst length in misl defense mode. Shoot x times, then switch. * 2: Check primary objective / priority after x seconds tops * 3: Ships on general Protect orders protect the closest x non-hostile stations * 4: Pause in ms after firing ANY missile salvo * 5:
$Config.arr[1] = 3 $Config.arr[2] = 12 $Config.arr[3] = 2 $Config.arr[4] = 7000
* 10-19 are turret script configurations. * 10: Attack My Target * 11: Attack Enemies * 12: Protect Ship * 13: Attack Capitals * 14: Attack Fighters * 15: Missile Defense * 16: Missiles Only * 17: Protocol Alpha * 18: Protocol Beta * 19: Protocol Gamma
* Array for the config OF a turret script: * 0: Required command ware * 1: Laser Switching * 1= capital ships, 2= all ships * 2: DIS-Allow area lasers like PSG ( 1 = scan for friends ) * 3: Excess percent for missile turrets
* 10: Turret function 1 * 11: Turret function 2... * 19: Turret function 10
* Turret Functions: * 1 = Attack CP target (own ship) -- * 2 = Attack CP target (all my ships) -- * 3 = Attack what my ship is attacking -- * 4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft * 5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft * 6 = attack capital ships (big) * 7 = attack capital ships (huge) * 8 = attack fighters * 9 = protect ship, attack attackers Mk1 * 10 = Missile Defense
$Software.Required = [TRUE] * * * Attack My Target $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 1 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[10] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
$Software.Required = Kampfsoftware MK1 * * * Attack Enemies $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 4 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr skip if $Race == Player append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[11] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Protect Ship $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr skip if $Race == Player append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[12] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
$Software.Required = Kampfsoftware MK2 * * * Attack Capitals $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 6 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr skip if $Race == Player append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[13] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Attack Fighters $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 8 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr skip if $Race == Player append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[14] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Missile Defense $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 5 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[15] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Missile Defense Only $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Config.arr[16] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
$Software.Required = null * * * Protocol Alpha $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required if not $Race == Player append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 4 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr end gosub Set.AI.Defaults $Config.arr[17] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Protocol Beta $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required if not $Race == Player append 10 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 9 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 3 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr append 5 to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr end gosub Set.AI.Defaults $Config.arr[18] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
* * * Protocol Gamma $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = array alloc: size=10 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = $Software.Required gosub Set.AI.Defaults $Config.arr[19] = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr
gosub Update.Required.Software endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Set.AI.Defaults: $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[3] = 15 if $Race == Player $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[2] = 1 else $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[1] = 1 end endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Update.Required.Software: skip if $Race == Player endsub $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[10] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_TARGET upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[11] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_KILL_ENEMIES upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[12] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_PROTECT upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[13] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_CAPITAL upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[14] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_FIGHTER upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[15] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILE_DEFENCE upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[16] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILEONLY upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[17] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_C_ALPHA upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[18] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_C_BETA upgrade=$Dummy1 $Dummy.arr = $Config.arr[19] $Dummy1 = $Dummy.arr[0] set script command upgrade: command=COMMAND_TURRET_C_GAMMA upgrade=$Dummy1 endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Menu.Main.Display: * Menu to select, which turret command to edit.
$Menu.arr = create custom menu array: heading=null
* List available scripts: $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3512 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1
$Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3526 $Script = 9 while $Script < 19 inc $Script = gosub Display.Script.Name $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = $Config.arr[$Script] $Index.Priority.max = size of array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr do if $Index.Priority.max == 10 $Dummy2 = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $Dummy2, $Dummy1, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy2 returnvalue=$Script end
add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=' ' $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3514 add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue='reset'
if $Debug $Dummy1 = ' Debug: Viewing AI scripts' do if $Race == Player $Dummy1 = ' Debug: Viewing Player scripts' add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=$Race end
$Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3510 $Dummy2 = read text: page=$Page id=3512 @ $Menu.Return = open custom menu: title=$Dummy1 description=null option array=$Menu.arr endsub return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Display.Script.Name: * Name of the edited script: if $Script == 10 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=101 else if $Script == 11 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=100 else if $Script == 12 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=103 else if $Script == 13 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=107 else if $Script == 14 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=106 else if $Script == 15 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=102 else if $Script == 16 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=105 else if $Script == 17 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=908 else if $Script == 18 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=909 else if $Script == 19 $Dummy2 = read text: page=2010 id=910 else return null end endsub return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Menu.Main.Process.Result:
if is datatype[ $Menu.Return ] == DATATYPE_RACE if $Race == Player $Race = Argonen else $Race = Player end endsub end
if is datatype[ $Menu.Return ] == DATATYPE_INT if $Menu.Return > 9 AND $Menu.Return < 20 $Mode = 'm2' $Script = $Menu.Return endsub end end
if is datatype[ $Menu.Return ] == DATATYPE_STRING if $Menu.Return == 'reset' set global variable: name=$VarName.Config value=null end end
endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Menu.Script.Display: skip if is datatype[ $Script ] == DATATYPE_INT return null do if $Script < 10 OR $Script > 19 return null $Turret.Script.Setup.arr = $Config.arr[$Script] $Menu.arr = create custom menu array: heading=null
* Header for the script priority list: gosub Display.Script.Name
* Print active script priority list: $Require.None = 0 $Require.Mk1 = 0 $Require.Mk2 = 0 $Index.Priority.max = size of array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr $Index.Priority = 9 $Priority.Display = 0
$Dummy1 = sprintf: pageid=$Page textid=3528, $Dummy2, null, null, null, null add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1
if $Index.Priority.max < 11 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3518 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 else dec $Index.Priority.max =
while $Index.Priority < $Index.Priority.max inc $Index.Priority = inc $Priority.Display = $Priority.Content = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[$Index.Priority] $Require.None = [TRUE] do if $Priority.Content == 4 OR $Priority.Content == 5 OR $Priority.Content == 9 inc $Require.Mk1 = do if $Priority.Content == 6 OR $Priority.Content == 7 OR $Priority.Content == 8 OR $Priority.Content == 10 OR $Priority.Content == 11 OR $Priority.Content == 12 OR $Priority.Content == 13 inc $Require.Mk2 =
gosub Get.Priority.Name
if $Dummy1 $Dummy1 = sprintf: pageid=$Page textid=3530, $Priority.Display, $Dummy1, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=$Priority.Content end do if $Dummy2 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy2 do if $Dummy3 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy3 end end
* Print available script priority list: $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3534 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1
$Index.Priority.max = size of array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr if $Index.Priority.max > 22 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3518 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 else $Priority.Content = 0 while $Priority.Content < 13 inc $Priority.Content = $Dummy1 = get index of $Priority.Content in array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr offset=9 + 1 if $Dummy1 == -1 gosub Get.Priority.Name
if $Dummy1 $Dummy1 = sprintf: pageid=$Page textid=3532, '-', $Dummy1, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=$Priority.Content end do if $Dummy2 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy2 do if $Dummy3 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy3 end end end
* Automatic laser switching on/off $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3516 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1
$Laser.Switching = $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[1] if $Laser.Switching == 1 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3522 else if $Laser.Switching == 2 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3524 else $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3526 end $Dummy1 = sprintf: fmt=' %s', $Dummy1, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue='switch'
* Allow area lasers if $Laser.Switching $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3536 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3537 do if $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[2] $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3538 add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue='area' end
* Print the required Fight software $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3517 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1 if $Require.Mk2 $Dummy1 = sprintf: fmt=' %s', Kampfsoftware MK2, null, null, null, null add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = Kampfsoftware MK2 else if $Require.Mk1 $Dummy1 = sprintf: fmt=' %s', Kampfsoftware MK1, null, null, null, null add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = Kampfsoftware MK1 else if $Require.None $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3518 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = [TRUE] else $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3519 add non selectable menu item: $Menu.arr, text=$Dummy1 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[0] = null end gosub Update.Required.Software
$Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3510 @ $Menu.Return = open custom menu: title=$Dummy1 description=null option array=$Menu.arr endsub
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Get.Priority.Name: * Turret Functions: * 1 = Attack CP target (own ship) -- * 2 = Attack CP target (all my ships) -- * 3 = Attack what my ship is attacking -- * 4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft * 5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft * 6 = attack capital ships (big) * 7 = attack capital ships (huge) * 8 = attack fighters * 9 = protect ship, attack attackers Mk1 * 10 = Missile Defense * 11 = attack capital ships (big not huge) * 12 = Missile Defense High Yield * 13 = Missile Defense Barrage
$Dummy1 = null $Dummy2 = null $Dummy3 = null
$Index.Content = $Priority.Content * 3 + 3547 do if read text: page id=$Page, id=$Index.Content exists $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=$Index.Content inc $Index.Content = do if read text: page id=$Page, id=$Index.Content exists $Dummy2 = read text: page=$Page id=$Index.Content inc $Index.Content = do if read text: page id=$Page, id=$Index.Content exists $Dummy3 = read text: page=$Page id=$Index.Content endsub return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Menu.Script.Process.Result: if $Menu.Return == -1 $Mode = 'm1' $Menu.Return = null endsub
else if $Menu.Return == 'switch' $Mode = 'm3' endsub
else if $Menu.Return == 'area' if $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[2] $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[2] = null else $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[2] = 1 end endsub end
if is datatype[ $Menu.Return ] == DATATYPE_INT if $Menu.Return > 0 AND $Menu.Return < 14 $Index.Content = get index of $Menu.Return in array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr offset=9 + 1 if $Index.Content > -1 * Remove, if part of the list: remove element from array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr at index $Index.Content else append $Menu.Return to array $Turret.Script.Setup.arr end endsub end end
endsub return null
* _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ * _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Menu.Switch.Display: $Menu.arr = create custom menu array: heading=null $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3520 add custom menu heading to array $Menu.arr: title=$Dummy1
$Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3522 add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=1 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3524 add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=2 $Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3526 add custom menu item to array $Menu.arr: text=$Dummy1 returnvalue=100
$Dummy1 = read text: page=$Page id=3510 @ $Menu.Return = open custom menu: title=$Dummy1 description=null option array=$Menu.arr
if $Menu.Return == 1 OR $Menu.Return == 2 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[1] = $Menu.Return else if $Menu.Return == 100 $Turret.Script.Setup.arr[1] = null end $Mode = 'm2' endsub return null

comment.var: Can view / edit the AI script settings in debug mode.
Player and AI values are kept in completely separate arrays.
1: Max burst length in misl defense mode. Shoot x times, then switch.
2: Check primary objective / priority after x seconds tops
3: Ships on general Protect orders protect the closest x non-hostile stations
4: Pause in ms after firing ANY missile salvo
Array for the config OF a turret script:
2: DIS-Allow area lasers like PSG ( 1 = scan for friends )
3 = Attack what my ship is attacking --
4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft
5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft
Menu to select, which turret command to edit.

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Header for the script priority list:

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu heading to array

comment.var: 3 = Attack what my ship is attacking --
4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft
5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft
Remove, if part of the list:

line.text: add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array

sval.val: Turret Missile Defense Mk3 - Config and setup
Can view / edit the AI script settings in debug mode.
Player and AI values are kept in completely separate arrays.
1: Max burst length in misl defense mode. Shoot x times, then switch.
2: Check primary objective / priority after x seconds tops
3: Ships on general Protect orders protect the closest x non-hostile stations
4: Pause in ms after firing ANY missile salvo
Array for the config OF a turret script:
2: DIS-Allow area lasers like PSG ( 1 = scan for friends )
3 = Attack what my ship is attacking --
4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft
5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft
Menu to select, which turret command to edit.
Header for the script priority list:
3 = Attack what my ship is attacking --
4 = attack any enemies Mk1 Fight soft
5 = attack any enemies - conditional on ship cmd Mk1 Fight soft
Remove, if part of the list:
